description: A React functional component named Overlay that renders a modal-like overlay for pause or game-over states in a Tetris game frontend. It displays a title, message, and primary/secondary action buttons.

methods.name: Overlay({ title, text, primaryActionLabel, secondaryActionLabel, onPrimary, onSecondary, showPrimary = true, })
methods.description: React functional component that renders an overlay with title, text, and action buttons for game states.

ctags.name: Overlay
ctags.signature: ({ title, text, primaryActionLabel, secondaryActionLabel, onPrimary, onSecondary, showPrimary = true, })
